nodes.text: The SM-06 Detonator Droid was a model of small battle droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. Designed to approach a target and explode, SM-06 Detonator Droids were among the forces stationed at the ruptured vault under the command of the Shroud's lieutenant Peej.

SM-06 Detonator Droids appear as enemies in one of the macrobinoculars missions—"An Emerging Dread" for Republic players and "A Spy's Secret" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
